sectionOne.title: Join developer communities
sectionOne.description: Discover and join up with the developer communities in Medellin. Connect with like-minded professionals and grow your network.

sectionTwo.title: Find tech events
sectionTwo.description: Never miss out on any tech events in Medellin. With medellin.dev, you can find the events you are interested in and join the conversation.

JoinSection.title: Join our community of fans that love medellin.dev
